rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that doubles as a living area with colonial style detailing and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dining room integrated with the living space for enhanced social interactions.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact, efficient kitchen design suitable for a bachelor pad and serving as a multi-functional space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Serves as an extra room for guests; designed with colonial charm.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living area for the household help, including a small kitchenette and bedroom.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed for a bachelor pad with built-in closets and Vastu-aligned positioning.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable secondary bedroom maintaining colonial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: A quiet study room integrated into the living space for work-from-home flexibility.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated private gym area with equipment storage and natural ventilation to promote a healthy lifestyle.
